title: Yadaphone - Affordable International Calling
description: Yadaphone lets you make and receive cheap international calls directly from your browser, using voice over IP technology. Perfect for travelers, expats, and businesses needing cost-effective communication.
features: Pay-as-you-go model for individuals and businesses
No subscription fees - just purchase credits
Make calls to any mobile or landline number for cents
Supports both individual and enterprise clients

sections.title: Hero
sections.content: Join thousands of users making affordable international calls with Yadaphone.

sections.title: Features
sections.content: Discover how Yadaphone stands out with its unique pay-as-you-go model and user-friendly interface.

sections.title: How It Works
sections.content: Simply purchase credits and start making calls instantly without any subscriptions.

sections.title: Pricing
sections.content: Flexible pricing based on credits purchased, ensuring you only pay for what you use.
